title: Was It "Luck"?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if the Astros “got lucky” beating the Yankees in Game 2 of the ALCS, how much better the 49ers are after trading for Christian McCaffery and David Pollack joins the show for 5 Good Minutes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Christian McCaffery gets traded to the 49ers and if the Astros "got lucky".
